sections.heading: Intro
sections.copy: Hi, I am Robert Miller. Dabbling in academia, design and development in an effort to make the web an exciting place for others.

sections.heading: About
sections.copy: Always thinking, sometimes designing. I am a UI/UX designer based in Melbourne that would like to make the internet and eventually the world a better place for others. Working for a small digital agency I design new digital products and try to improve the user experience of existing products. I teach Web Design and User Experience as part of the Bachelor of Arts (Content Creation) and am also undertaking postgraduate studies of Graduate Certificate in Internet Communications. I believe designers should be considered more than creators of pretty pictures.

sections.heading: Thoughts
sections.copy: Works as a Javascript Enginneer. Has experience with Gatsby, React, Javascript, Node, Mongo and a little Python as well
sections.workquote: “We are what we pretend to be, so we must be careful about what we pretend to be.”

posts.copy: Always up for a challenge, I enjoy learning and endeavour to stay up to date with new technologies.

sections.heading: Connect
sections.copy: I share more at some of these other sites. Reach out and get in touch with me.
